thread.title: Nadal, Djokovic to renew rivalry in final of China Open
thread.title_full: Nadal, Djokovic to renew rivalry in final of China Open

title: Nadal, Djokovic to renew rivalry in final of China Open
text:
> Top News Nadal, Djokovic to renew rivalry in final of China Open Novak Djokovic of Serbia hits a return shot while playing against David Ferrer of Spain during their men's singles semifinal match in the China Open tennis tournament at the National Tennis Stadium in Beijing, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015. (AP Photo/Mark Schiefelbein) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
